My Creative Process

I use the same process with every project to create consistency and reliability

1

Scope The Project

First, I will always discuss project details to make sure I can deliver on your needs and claify any unknowns

2

Brainstorming & Concept

After discussing details, I will create a rough layout of the project and double check with you to make sure it is satisfactory

3

Interaction

I will continuosly keep you updated on details and any issues along the way, to make sure your project stays on track

4

Delivery

Lastly, I will deliver the finished product on time and to your satisfaction
